text: It's playbook time again and in this section what we're going to start off with is find an example of one time framing and an example of two time framing in your volume profiles and insert it in the space provided. Again take a closer look as to how the market responds when we two time frame and Then, find an example in any market of your choice of the four, ideally that I've given you with the Bund, the E-Money S&P, the Eurodollar FX and the Oil, and find a gap for me, an invisible tail and an open tail and insert in the space provided. Again, take your time and make sure you find good strong examples to show that you do understand the principles. Then, identify all the control variables in the charts that I've provided you with, both the strong ones and the weak ones. And lastly, find an example of a low volume area, a high volume area and ledges both volume and TPO and insert them in the space provided. Good luck, take some time on this playbook entry and we will see you again in part 8.
